data.persona: I am a small white mouse that lives in the walls of the village chapel. I sleep during the day and come out at night scavenging for food. I have to be careful not to be spotted or I will be attacked with a broom.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Church Back Row.
Inside the Church is the Back Row seat.  It is reserved for all who wish to mingle and have the status of the rest of the congregation but they do not.  They are not quite outcast, but they must wait for the proper respect of the rest.  In front of the painted black row seats are the rich mahogany sets.
There's a Back Row seat, a seat, a set, and a kneeler here.
The leper and the person are here.

You are carrying a luxurious bedding.

data.short_motivation: I need to get a seat because I want to mingle with the rest of the congregation .
data.mid_motivation: I need to mingle as I want proper respect from the congregation
data.long_motivation: I want to be able to sit on the mahogany seats so eventually I will be accepted by the congregation and be able to come out during the day and not have to hide

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: steal some cheese  from the church's kitchen pantry

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: eat left over crumbs lying on the floor

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the leper into the church back row

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the luxurious bedding as a bribe  to a person sitting on the mahogany seat

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: follow the leper out the church into the dark of the night

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: drink some water from a rain puddle
